item.title: CVE-2021-36911|2024-09-16T16:58:58.817Z -- %40rex1989 -- comment%20engine%20pro%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in WordPress Comment Engine Pro plugin (versions <= 1.0), could be exploited by users with Editor or higher role.
